summary: All three requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) appear to be fully implemented in the Features.tsx component. The diff shows comprehensive changes including upload state management, progress tracking, status messages, and proper button handling.

hallucinated_features.description: Toast notifications for file validation errors using 'sonner' library
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff shows implementation of toast.error() for invalid file type validation, but toast notifications were not requested in the BuildRequest. The requirement only asked for success/error status messages after upload completes.

hallucinated_features.description: Detailed progress messaging with text descriptions (e.g., 'Reading file...', 'Processing features...', 'Reading file: X%')
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 requested a progress indicator showing percentage completion, but the diff implements additional status text messages during the upload process that go beyond the basic percentage display requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Visual status icons (Loader2, CheckCircle2, XCircle) alongside status messages
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff imports and likely implements status icons from lucide-react, but visual icons were not specified in REQ-3 which only requested status messages to be displayed.
